snippet.title: Shadowveil: Legend of the Five Rings - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2536960/Shadowveil_Legend_of_The_Five_Rings/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=GPtrailer

COMING Q1 2025 TO PC/Steam!

You play as the commander, guiding your expedition’s journey through the Shadowlands. You’ll need to strategically plan your objectives, decide who to recruit and how to specialize the samurai under your command, and figure out the most potent configuration of items and abilities if you hope to survive!

So don your armor, grab your tetsubō, and say a prayer to your ancestors as you prepare to embark on a perilous journey. 
Add Shadowveil: Legend of the Five Rings to your Steam wishlist today! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2536960/Shadowveil_Legend_of_The_Five_Rings/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=GPtrailer
